00035 typedef struct {
00036   int ncluster;
00037   char (*clusterfname)[255];
00038   char (*clusterfmd5hash)[255];
00039   SlaterDet* cluster;
00040   int* ng;
00041   int* idx;
00042   int* xi;              
00043 } ClustersFMDInternals;

00045 
00046 Parameterization ParameterizationClustersFMD = {
00047   name : "ClustersFMD",
00048   Pararead : ClustersFMDread,
00049   Parawrite : ClustersFMDwrite,
00050   Paraclone : ClustersFMDclone,
00051   ParainitSlaterDet : ClustersFMDinitSlaterDet,
00052   ParatoSlaterDet : ClustersFMDtoSlaterDet,
00053   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : ClustersFMDprojectgradSlaterDet
00054 };

00056 
00057 // number of parameters for Cluster (position, velocity, orientation)
00058 #define NCLUSTER 9
00059 
00060 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00061 #define NGAUSS 12

00063 
00064 void ClustersFMDclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00065 {
00066   int i;
00067 
00068   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00069   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00070   qp->n = q->n;
00071 
00072   qp->x = malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00073   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00074     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00075 
00076   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00077   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(ClustersFMDInternals));
00078   ClustersFMDInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00079   ClustersFMDInternals *qint = q->internals;
00080 
00081   qpint->ncluster = qint->ncluster;
00082   qpint->clusterfname = malloc(qint->ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00083   qpint->clusterfmd5hash = malloc(qint->ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00084   for (i=0; i<qint->ncluster; i++) {
00085     strcpy(qpint->clusterfname[i], qint->clusterfname[i]);
00086     strcpy(qpint->clusterfmd5hash[i], qint->clusterfmd5hash[i]);
00087   }
00088 
00089   qpint->cluster = malloc(qint->ncluster*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00090   for (i=0; i<qint->ncluster; i++)
00091     cloneSlaterDet(&qint->cluster[i], &qpint->cluster[i]);
00092 
00093   qpint->ng = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00094   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00095     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00096   qpint->idx = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00097   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00098     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00099   qpint->xi = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00100   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00101     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00102 }

00107 int ClustersFMDread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00108 {
00109   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00110   int i,k;
00111   ClustersFMDInternals* qint;
00112 
00113   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(ClustersFMDInternals));
00114                                         
00115   do
00116     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00117   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00118   if (feof(fp)) {
00119     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00120     return -1;
00121   }
00122   
00123   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00124 
00125   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00126   if (strcmp(Pname, "ClustersFMD")) {
00127     fprintf(stderr, "not a ClustersFMD parameter set\n");
00128     return -1;
00129   }
00130   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00131 
00132   // read clusters
00133   int ncluster;
00134 
00135   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00136   if(sscanf(buf, "<Clusters %d>", &ncluster) != 1) {
00137     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00138     return -1;
00139   }
00140   qint->ncluster = ncluster;
00141   qint->clusterfname = malloc(ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00142   qint->clusterfmd5hash = malloc(ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00143   qint->cluster = malloc(ncluster*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00144 
00145   double clusterx[ncluster][NCLUSTER];
00146   for (i=0; i<ncluster; i++) {
00147     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00148     if (sscanf(buf, "<Cluster (%lf, %lf, %lf) (%lf, %lf, %lf) (%lf, %lf, %lf) %s %s>",
00149                &clusterx[i][0], &clusterx[i][1], &clusterx[i][2],
00150                &clusterx[i][3], &clusterx[i][4], &clusterx[i][5],
00151                &clusterx[i][6], &clusterx[i][7], &clusterx[i][8],
00152                qint->clusterfname[i], qint->clusterfmd5hash[i]) != 11) {
00153       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00154       return -1;
00155     }
00156     if (strncmp(qint->clusterfmd5hash[i], md5hash(qint->clusterfname[i]), 32)) {
00157       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00158       return -1;
00159     }
00160     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&qint->cluster[i], qint->clusterfname[i]))
00161       return -1;
00162   }
00163 
00164   // read nucleon parameters
00165   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00166   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00167     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00168     return -1;
00169   }
00170   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00171     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00172             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00173     return -1;
00174   }
00175   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00176   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00177     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00178     return -1;
00179   }
00180 
00181   qint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00182   qint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00183   qint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00184   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++) {
00185     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00186     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00187     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00188   }
00189   
00190   q->n = q->ngauss*NGAUSS+ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00191 
00192   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00193 
00194   for (k=0; k<ncluster; k++)
00195     for (i=0; i<NCLUSTER; i++)
00196       q->x[i+k*NCLUSTER] = clusterx[k][i];
00197 
00198   int nclust = ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00199   int xi;
00200   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00201   double are, aim, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00202   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00203     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00204     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00205                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00206                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00207                &are, &aim, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 14) {
00208       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00209               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00210       return -1;
00211     }
00212     qint->ng[k]++;
00213     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00214     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust] = chi0im;
00215     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust] = chi1im;
00216     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust] = are;    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust] = aim;
00217     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust] = b0im;
00218     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust] = b1im;
00219     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust] = b2im;
00220   }     
00221   for (k=1; k<q->A; k++) 
00222     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00223 
00224   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00225   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00226     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00227     return -1;
00228   }     
00229 
00230   return 0;
00231 }

00234 int ClustersFMDwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00235 {
00236   int k, ki, i;
00237   ClustersFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00238 
00239   fprintf(fp, "<Para ClustersFMD %s>\n", q->name);
00240 
00241   fprintf(fp, "<Clusters %d>\n", qint->ncluster);
00242 
00243   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00244     fprintf(fp, "<Cluster (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) %s %s\n", 
00245             q->x[0+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[1+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[2+k*NCLUSTER],
00246             q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[4+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[5+k*NCLUSTER],
00247             q->x[6+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[7+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[8+k*NCLUSTER],
00248             qint->clusterfname[k], qint->clusterfmd5hash[k]);
00249   }
00250 
00251   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00252   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00253 
00254   int nclust = qint->ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00255 
00256   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00257     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00258       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00259       fprintf(fp,
00260               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00261               k, qint->xi[k],
00262               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust],
00263               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust],
00264               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust],
00265               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust],
00266               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust],
00267               q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust]);
00268   }
00269   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00270 
00271   return 0;
00272 }

00275 void ClustersFMDinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00276 {
00277   int k, ki, in;
00278   ClustersFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00279 
00280   Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N; Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00281   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00282     Q->A += qint->cluster[k].A; 
00283     Q->Z += qint->cluster[k].Z; 
00284     Q->N += qint->cluster[k].N;
00285     Q->ngauss += qint->cluster[k].ngauss;
00286   }
00287 
00288   // collect ngs
00289   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00290   in=0;
00291   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00292     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].A; ki++) {
00293       Q->ng[in] = qint->cluster[k].ng[ki];
00294       in++;
00295     }
00296   }
00297   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00298     Q->ng[in+k] = qint->ng[k];
00299 
00300   // build idx from ng
00301   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00302   Q->idx[0] = 0;
00303   for (k=1; k<Q->A; k++)
00304     Q->idx[k] = Q->idx[k-1]+Q->ng[k-1];
00305 
00306   // set xi of Gaussians
00307   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00308   in=0;
00309   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00310     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; ki++) {
00311       Q->G[in].xi = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].xi;
00312       in++;
00313     }
00314   }
00315   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++) 
00316     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00317       Q->G[in + qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00318 
00319 }

00321 
00322 void ClustersFMDtoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00323 {
00324   ClustersFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00325 
00326   int i,k;
00327   double* euler;
00328   double* pos;
00329   double* vel;
00330   complex double R2[2][2];
00331   double R3[3][3];
00332 
00333   // the clusters
00334   int gi = 0;
00335   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00336     pos = &q->x[0+k*NCLUSTER];
00337     vel = &q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER];
00338     euler = &q->x[6+k*NCLUSTER];
00339     rotatemat2(euler, R2);
00340     rotatemat3(euler, R3);
00341     for (i=0; i<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; i++) {
00342       Q->G[gi] = qint->cluster[k].G[i];
00343       rotateGaussian(&Q->G[gi], R3, R2);
00344       boostGaussian(&Q->G[gi], vel);
00345       moveGaussian(&Q->G[gi], pos);
00346       gi++;
00347     }
00348   }
00349 
00350   // the nucleons
00351   int nclust = qint->ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00352   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00353     Q->G[gi+i].chi[0] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust];
00354     Q->G[gi+i].chi[1] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust];
00355     Q->G[gi+i].a      = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust];
00356     Q->G[gi+i].b[0]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust];
00357     Q->G[gi+i].b[1]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust];
00358     Q->G[gi+i].b[2]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust];
00359   }
00360 }

00362 
00363 void ClustersFMDprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00364                                      const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00365 {
00366   ClustersFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00367   Gaussian* G;
00368 
00369   int i,j,k,ki,gk;
00370 
00371   double* vel;
00372   double* euler;
00373   complex double dR2[3][2][2];
00374   double dR3[3][3][3];
00375   complex double R2[2][2];
00376   double R3[3][3];
00377   complex double Rb[3], Rchi[2];
00378   complex double phase;
00379   complex double dchidang[2];
00380   complex double dbdang[3];
00381 
00382   // gradients with respect to clusters
00383   gk=0;
00384   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00385     for (i=0; i<NCLUSTER; i++)
00386       dq[i+k*NCLUSTER] = 0.0;
00387 
00388     // velocity of cluster
00389     vel = &q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER];
00390 
00391     // rotation matrices and its derivatives
00392     euler = &q->x[6+k*NCLUSTER];
00393     rotatemat2(euler, R2);
00394     rotatemat3(euler, R3);
00395     derivrotatemat2(euler, dR2);
00396     derivrotatemat3(euler, dR3);
00397 
00398     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; ki++) {
00399 
00400       G = &qint->cluster[k].G[ki];
00401 
00402       for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00403         Rchi[j] = G->chi[j];
00404       cm2mult(R2, Rchi);
00405 
00406       for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00407         Rb[j] = G->b[j];
00408       m3mult(R3, Rb);
00409 
00410       // derivatives with respect to position
00411       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00412         dq[i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].b[i]);
00413 
00414       // derivatives with respect to velocity
00415       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00416         dq[3+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(conj(I*mass(G->xi)*G->a)*
00417                                         dQ->gradval[gk].b[i]);
00418 
00419       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00420         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00421           dq[3+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(conj(I*mass(G->xi)*Rb[i] - G->a*vel[i])*
00422                                           dQ->gradval[gk].chi[j]);
00423 
00424       // derivatives with respect to angles
00425 
00426       phase = cexp(I*mass(G->xi)*(vel[0]*Rb[0]+vel[1]*Rb[1]+vel[2]*Rb[2])-
00427                    0.5*G->a*(vel[0]*vel[0]+vel[1]*vel[1]+vel[2]*vel[2]));
00428 
00429       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00430         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00431           dbdang[j] = G->b[j];
00432         m3mult(dR3[i], dbdang);
00433         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00434           dq[6+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].b[j]*conj(dbdang[j]));
00435 
00436         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00437           dchidang[j] = phase* G->chi[j];
00438         cm2mult(dR2[i], dchidang);
00439         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00440           dchidang[j] += I*mass(G->xi)*
00441             (vel[0]*dbdang[0]+vel[1]*dbdang[1]+vel[2]*dbdang[2])*phase*Rchi[j];
00442         
00443         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00444           dq[6+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(phase*dQ->gradval[gk].chi[j]*conj(dchidang[j]));
00445 
00446       }
00447 
00448       gk++;
00449     }
00450   }
00451 
00452   // gradients with respect to nucleons
00453   int nclust = qint->ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00454   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00455     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[0]);
00456     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[0]);
00457     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[1]);
00458     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[1]);
00459     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].a);
00460     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].a);
00461     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[0]);
00462     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[0]);
00463     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[1]);
00464     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[1]);
00465     dq[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[2]);
00466     dq[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[2]);
00467   }
00468 }
